## RoundingMode enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum RoundingMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  HalfDown | <code>&quot;HalfDown&quot;</code> | \[Round half down\](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rounding\#Round\_half\_down). Rounding mode used by, e.g., \[Avalara Sales TaxII\](https://help.avalara.com/kb/001/How\_does\_Rounding\_with\_SalesTaxII\_work%3F) |
|  HalfEven | <code>&quot;HalfEven&quot;</code> | \[Round half to even\](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rounding\#Round\_half\_to\_even). Default rounding mode as used in IEEE 754 computing functions and operators. |
|  HalfUp | <code>&quot;HalfUp&quot;</code> | \[Round half up\](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rounding\#Round\_half\_up) |
